price: 43. Verheerlijkt en verheven is Hij! Van het grote leugen dat zij vertellen!
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يَقُولُونَ عُلُوّٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yaqūlūna ʿuluwwan kabīran
